0871A46B.Toast: A tradesman has been recruiting help to rebuild a ruined town.

44ADC39F.Phase46Description: Lakren suggests we can rebuild Sanctuary one brick at a time. I need only to meet him near the Lost Monument on The Scarred Coast to begin this great work.
